logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
404_message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
no_permission: You don't have permission to access the
changesWillNotBeSaved: All your changes will not be saved!
areYouSureDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete all?
noAreaToUser: there is no areas, please create a new one for your account
title: Title
errorMessage: An error occurred while loading the data.

error-massage.badRequest: Bad Request: The server could not understand the request.
error-massage.forbidden: Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
error-massage.notFound: Not Found: The requested resource could not be found.
error-massage.internalServerError: Internal Server Error: Something went wrong on the server.
error-massage.badGateway: Bad Gateway: The server received an invalid response.
error-massage.serviceUnavailable: Service Unavailable: The server is currently unavailable.

name.description: A general name field for entities like Target, Area, or Node

radius.positive: Radius must be a positive number

frequency.positive: Frequency must be a positive number

deviceType.description: The type of the device (e.g., drone, node, etc.)

node.description: Represents a node with location and operational status

flyZone.description: An array of points defining the fly zone

circle.centerDescription: The center point of the circle
circle.description: Represents a circle defined by a center point and radius

area.boundaryDescription: The boundary of the area (geometry data)
area.description: Represents an area with a name and defined boundary

drone.description: Represents a drone with unique details

id.description: A unique identifier for a record or entity

userId.description: A unique identifier for a user

action.description: A description of the action performed (e.g., 'create', 'update')

tableName.max: Table name must not exceed 100 characters
tableName.description: The name of the table affected by the action

recordId.description: The ID of the record in the affected table

details.description: A JSON object containing additional details about the action

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the action or event occurred

alertStatus.description: The status of the alert ('suc' = success, 'err' = error, 'reg' = regular)

isoDateString.invalidFormat: Invalid date-time format. Use ISO 8601 format.
isoDateString.description: A valid ISO 8601 formatted date string

alert.description: Represents an alert with time, title, and status
alert.timeDescription: The time the alert was created
alert.messageDescription: The message or description of the alert

token.min: The token must be at least 10 characters long
token.max: The token must not exceed 500 characters

statusCode.min: The status code must be at least 100 (valid HTTP status)
statusCode.max: The status code must be at most 599 (valid HTTP status)
statusCode.description: HTTP status code, e.g., 200 for success, 400 for client error

message.description: A human-readable description of the request or response status

data.description: Payload or data that can be any type

areaName.max: Area name must not exceed 50 characters
areaName.description: The name of the area this setting belongs to

wifiPassword.description: WiFi network password for the system

signalStrength.min: Signal strength cannot be less than 0

username.min: Username must be at least 5 characters
username.max: Username must be less than 20 characters
username.regex: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
username.description: The unique username of the user

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character
password.description: The password for the user, between 8 and 18 characters

userData.role: The role of the user in the system
